**The Ultimate Offline Notes App — Built with Love, Powered by You**

> **No ads. No tracking. No login.**  
> Just **pure, fast, beautiful notes** — **offline forever**.

---

## **Live App**  
[https://wized1.github.io/Notes](https://wized1.github.io/Notes) [Open in Browser](https://wized1.github.io/Notes)

**Install it in 3 seconds** → Add to Home Screen!

---

## **Features**  
| Feature | Status |
|-------|--------|
| **100% Offline** | Works without internet |
| **Auto-Save** | Never lose a word |
| **Swipe to Delete** | Smooth & satisfying |
| **Dark / Light Mode** | Saved automatically |
| **PWA Installable** | Feels like a real app |
| **SVG Icon** | Sharp on 4K screens |
| **Zero Bloat** | < 10KB total |
| **Privacy First** | No data leaves your device |

---

## **How to Install**  
### **Android (Chrome)**  
1. Open: [https://wized1.github.io/Notes](https://wized1.github.io/Notes) [Open Link](https://wized1.github.io/Notes)  
2. Tap **3 dots** → **"Add to Home screen"**  
3. Name: `Endroid Notes`  
4. Done! Opens like a native app.

### **iPhone (Safari)**  
1. Open link  
2. Tap **Share** → **"Add to Home Screen"**  
3. Tap **Add**  
4. Boom — it’s an app!

### **Desktop**  
- Chrome/Edge: Click install icon in address bar  
- Or just bookmark it!

---

## **Tech Stack**  
```text
HTML5 + CSS3 + Vanilla JS  
PWA + Service Worker Ready  
LocalStorage (Auto-Sync)  
SVG Icon (Scalable Forever)  
No Frameworks. No Bloat. Pure Speed.
